results.title: Using Ansible with Azure
results.description: Using Ansible with Azure Ansible is an open-source product that automates cloud provisioning, configuration management, and application deployments. Using Ansible you can provision virtual machines, containers, and network and complete cloud infrastructures. This article gives a basic overview of some of the benefits of using Ansible with Azure..

descriptions.content: Using Ansible with Azure Ansible is an open-source product that automates cloud provisioning, configuration management, and application deployments. This article gives a basic overview of some of the benefits of using Ansible with Azure..
